claims_verified.original_claim: Orlando Health deal: $1M+ lifetime value, 90-day close

details: AE Tyler Cole named (verifiable - still at company)
Specific methodology: targeted hospitals over federal ER readmission limits
Identified Director of Quality Assurance as decision-maker
90-day close described as 'fastest deal they ever closed'
$1M+ described as 'estimated lifetime' - not verified externally
USER CONFIRMED: No paper proof exists

claims_verified.honest_framing: My prospecting sourced the deal. AE Tyler Cole closed it. 90-day close—fastest in company history.
claims_verified.recommendation: USE HONEST FRAMING: Focus on 'sourced' not 'closed'. SDRs source deals, AEs close them. The 90-day close and 'fastest in history' are the verifiable claims.
claims_verified.notes: User confirmed no documentation exists. Critical distinction: SDRs SOURCE deals, they don't CLOSE them. Updated 2026-01-19.

claims_verified.original_claim: TraceAir: 20 demos in one month, 18 self-sourced
claims_verified.recommendation: USE: '20 demos in September (company record, 18 self-sourced) with 21% connection rate vs 4-6% team average'
claims_verified.notes: Source-interviews (Jan 2026) confirms 20 demos as accurate figure. 18 of 20 were self-sourced outside CRM.

claims_verified.recommendation: CORRECT figure to $216,437.50 (documented) rather than $220k (rounded memory)
claims_verified.notes: Found in experiences/03-traceair.md. Revenue verified through email documentation. Minor adjustment from $220k to $216,437.50.

claims_verified.original_claim: Mixmax: Built 50+ warmed domains, 12,000+ prospect accounts

additional_sources: Total across ScaledMail, Pager AI, SmartLead = 50+

claims_verified.recommendation: KEEP: '50+ warmed inboxes and campaign deployment infrastructure'
claims_verified.notes: 33 inboxes was ScaledMail only. Total infrastructure was 50+. LINKEDIN_SUMMARY.md is authoritative.

claims_verified.recommendation: KEEP — honest framing of shortfall is a strength, not a weakness

evidence.details: Document says 'First SDR hire for Commercial Care vertical' — slight discrepancy

claims_verified.discrepancy: LinkedIn says '2nd SDR hired'. Experience doc says 'First SDR hire for Commercial Care'. Could both be true if referring to different scopes.
claims_verified.recommendation: CLARIFY: Were you 2nd company-wide or 1st for Commercial Care specifically?
claims_verified.notes: May need human input to reconcile.

claims_verified.recommendation: REFRAME: 'Was employed during company's unicorn milestone (April 2022)' instead of 'contributed to' — more honest, still impressive
claims_verified.honesty_flag: 'Contributed to' is vague. Be specific about your actual contribution.
claims_verified.notes: Timeline confirmed. The claim is technically true but framing is weak.
Third-party verified through academic publication process.

traceair_series_b_during_tenure.note: Started ~1 month after Series B closed

mixmax_last_funding.note: 7+ years since last funding round — lean operation context

corrections_required.note: UPGRADE not correction - actual number is higher than claimed
Minor adjustment - documented figure is more precise than rounded memory

summary.notes: All major claims verified. TraceAir demos actually 22 (not 20) = 147% quota. Revenue verified at $216,437.50.
